description: Bulk insert operations are essential when dealing with large datasets in enterprise applications. In Spring Boot, efficiently handling bulk inserts can significantly improve performance and reduce the time complexity of database operations.
title: Bulk Insert in Spring Boot: A Comprehensive Guide

description: In software development, adhering to design principles can significantly impact the maintainability and scalability of your code. One such principle is the Open/Closed Principle (OCP), which states that "software entities should be open for extension but closed for modification.
title: Methods to Implement the Open/Closed Principle (OCP) in Your Code

description: Once upon a time…I bought a Tinkerforge Weather Station, wrote some C# code to interact with it, and managed to get it to run via Mono on a Raspberry PI with Linux.  My end goal was to measure temperature etc. in my garden, and somehow show it on this website..
title: Tinkerforge Weather Station, part 3 - Continuing the project after a decade
